Methods

PushBackgroundBack(float, Color, bool)

Adjusts the transparency and color of the background image.

public bool PushBackgroundBack(float alpha = 0.5, Color new_color = default, bool set_new_color = false)

Parameters

alpha float

The alpha value to set for the background transparency.

new_color Color

The new color to apply to the background.

set_new_color bool

Determines whether to apply the new color or just adjust the transparency.

Returns

bool

Always returns true after execution.

Called when the script instance is loaded. Initializes the additional screens.
